textBeforeTable: 1980 PPG Indy Car World Series Johnny Rutherford - Champion **The initial 5 races of the 1980 season were co-sanctioned by CART and USAC. After Mid-Ohio, USAC broke away from the deal, and the remainder of the season was run under CART sanction**
